Learn about the Survey Web package for b: Learn about the Survey Web package for building survey and questionnaire UI components.
Frontend component library for survey te: Frontend component library for survey template management and form rendering in MBC CQRS Serverless applications.
The Survey Web package (`@mbc-cqrs-serve: The Survey Web package (`@mbc-cqrs-serverless/survey-web`) provides React components for creating, editing, and rendering survey templates. It supports multiple question types, drag-and-drop section reordering, and real-time collaboration through AWS AppSync.

Renders a survey template as a fillable: Renders a survey template as a fillable form for respondents.
The Survey Web package supports 9 questi: The Survey Web package supports 9 question types:

Multi-line text area for detailed respon: Multi-line text area for detailed responses.

Configurable star/heart/thumb rating inp: Configurable star/heart/thumb rating input with 2-10 levels.

Time picker for time or duration input.
